HOME.TITLE: Repair Services
HOME.DESCRIPTION: We professionally repair smartphones, laptops, tablets and other electronics
HOME.SERVICE_CARD_PHONE: Phone repair (screen replacement, battery, firmware, etc.)
HOME.SERVICE_CARD_LAPTOP: Laptop repair (cleaning, keyboard, SSD, ports replacement)
HOME.PHONE_REP_DESC: Screen, battery, charging port replacements and more for all phone brands.
HOME.LAPTOP_REP_DESC: Motherboard, keyboard, screen repairs. Dust removal and thermal paste replacement.
HOME.LAPTOP_CLEAN_DESC: Complete cleaning of laptops and PCs to prevent overheating.
HOME.WIN_INSTALL_DESC: Reinstalling and configuring Windows, drivers, and useful apps.
HOME.APP_INSTALL_DESC: Installing office, graphics, antivirus, and other essential software.
HOME.DIAG_DESC: Quick issue diagnostics and expert consultation.
HOME.WHY_US_EXP_DESC: Our specialists with 5+ years of experience handle any task efficiently and professionally.
HOME.WHY_US_QUICK_DESC: Minor repairs on the same day. No queues or delays.
HOME.WHY_US_FAIR_PRICE_DESC: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Free diagnostics.
HOME.WHY_US_WARRANTY_DESC: We provide warranty for every type of repair we perform.
HOME.WHY_US_LOCATION_DESC: Located in the city center with easy parking access.
HOME.WHY_US_CONSULT_BY_PHONE_DESC: Call us — we’ll tell you the repair cost and estimated time.
HOME.HERO_SOCIALS: Follow us on our social media
HOME.HERO_TITLE: Phone and laptop repair in Valencia — fast, high-quality, guaranteed
HOME.HERO_SUBTITLE:
Free diagnostics.
Original parts.

FAQ.REPAIR_TIME_Q: How long does phone repair take?
FAQ.REPAIR_TIME_A: Simple jobs like battery or screen replacement are done in 1–2 hours. Complex cases take 1–3 days.
FAQ.RECORD_Q: Do I need to make an appointment?
FAQ.RECORD_A: Not necessarily — we also accept walk-ins. But to avoid waiting, we recommend calling ahead.
FAQ.WARRANTY_Q: Do you offer warranty on repairs?
FAQ.WARRANTY_A: Yes, we offer a warranty from 1 to 6 months depending on the type of service.
FAQ.DIAGNOSTICS_A: Diagnostics is free, even if you decide not to repair with us.
FAQ.LEGAL_ENTITIES_A: Yes, we serve both individuals and businesses. We provide work reports and legal documents.
